bill_title: Honoring the 2003 Madison Bulldogs High School gymnastics team: Kassie Finck, Brooke Postma, Brittany Postma, Abbie Brown, Katie Breuer, Landra Tieman, Kari Schaefer, and Amanda Harmon.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2003 Madison Bulldogs High School gymnastics team: Kassie Finck, Brooke Postma, Brittany Postma, Abbie Brown, Katie Breuer, Landra Tieman, Kari Schaefer, and Amanda Harmon. WHEREAS, the 2003 Madison Bulldogs High School gymnastics team won the Class A state championship for the ninth year in a row, proving again their determination to succeed and continued excellence; and WHEREAS, teammates, Katie Breuer, Amanda Harmon, and Brittany Postma qualified for the State A "All Tournament" Team. Their exceptional performances and dedication, along with their fellow teammates, contributed greatly to the success of the season; and WHEREAS, coach Maridee Wiese and assistant coach Kim Burns give exceptional guidance and support to the Madison gymnastics program; and WHEREAS, the students of the 2003 Madison Bulldogs High School gymnastics team showed unrelenting leadership and school pride: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2003 Madison Bulldogs High School gymnastics team be recognized for their excellence in athletics for the 2002-2003 school year.
